column1: Table 5: Release rates (per 1,000 prisoners) of sentenced prisoners from state prison, by type of release, 2000-2009
Authors: Heather C. West, Ph.D., William J. Sabol, Ph.D., and Sarah J. Greenman
Table 5. Release rates (per 1,000 prisoners) of sentenced prisoners from state prison, by type of release, 2000-2009

Note: The release rate is the ratio of the number of sentenced prisoners released from prison during the year divided by the number that could be released.  The number that could be released equals the number in prison at the start of the year plus the number admitted during the year.
